title: The Hidden Stairs and the Magic Carpet
description: The secret is out--DROON is the series that kids, parents, and teachers are talking about! And with a value-priced edition, this favorite is more exciting than ever.Something under the stairs...is magic! For Julie, Eric, and Neal, an enchanted staircase in Eric's basement is the portal to their first adventure in the fantastical and troubled land of Droon.
author: Tony Abbott
